title: Wrap SkTextToPathIter
body: Skia supports converting text (with a specified paint) to a series of SkPaths, which would be useful for me. The functionality is implemented in [`SkTextToPathIter`](https://github.com/mono/skia/blob/885431314fcbd2833483cf77d7fc3309e217b53f/src/core/SkTextToPathIter.h#L35).
